name: NFTAPE #3: ORIGINAL PIRATA
description:
NFTape brings you the experience of listening to a mixtape on a casset, in this series I'll bring you some flipped selections of songs that I've been collecting digitally and physically over the years recorded digitaly on a live dj performance. The craft of this work is in the curation, mix, distortion and cover art of the tape.

#OBRjkt2 edition celebrating the brazilian art, i selected some songs from the dark days of military domain on brazil, this not reflect the full spectrum of culture, it's just a randomic freestyle selection, changing moods and styles.

CONTAINING SAMPLES FROM
Djalma Côrrea / Antonio Adolfo / Arrigo Barnabe
Premeditando o Breque / Claudio Medeiros
Waldir Calmon / Jackson do Pandeiro
hermeto pascoal / Itamar Assumpção
A Barca Do Sol / Jards Macalé 
Dom Um Romao / Arnaud Rodrigues
Walter Franco / Abilio Manoel 
Os 7 Diabos / Quarteto Novo / Luiz Bonfa
